name: sunrise coaster + placemat
sizes_available: one size - coaster measures 5.5", placemat measures 13.5"
notes:
***a cheerful round coaster and matching placemat with crochet scalloped edging.***

bring sunshine to every meal with the sunrise coaster and placemat set. worked in simple rounds and finished with a playful shell border, this crochet duo is equal parts fun and functional. stitch up seasonal sets to keep your table fresh and those radiant sunrise vibes going strong.

*[view the free pattern on my blog!][1]*

**materials**

* 185 yards (1 skein) lion brand 24/7 cotton. one skein makes 1 coaster + 1 placemat.
* 4.5mm crochet hook
* scissors
* tapestry needle
* garment steamer

**techniques**

* double crochet stitch
* working in joined rounds
* fan stitch border
* steam blocking technique

**measurements**
one size - coaster measures 5.5", placemat measures 13.5"
